GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of the user with given username

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article with given ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: adjusts the vote count of the requested article by the amount specified in the body and responds with updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: creates a comment associated with article of given ID with content and author username given in request body, responds with the newly created comment

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments associated with the article of given ID

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: adjusts the vote count of the requested comment by the amount specified in the body and responds with updated comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment with given comment ID
